import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col ,ListGroup,Image,Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import Message from '../components/Message' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state =>state.cart) return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country},

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod} ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
